headline: How the Narrative Around MGM Resorts Is Shifting Amid Changing Analyst Expectations and Market Trends
summary: MGM Resorts International stock has recently seen its consensus analyst price target revised downward from $44.15 to $42.50. This move reflects updated expectations for the company’s near-term prospects. While the discount rate has remained steady, analysts are balancing optimism around international operations with concerns over domestic market softness. Stay tuned to learn how investors can keep pace with these shifting valuations and analyst outlooks for MGM stock. Analyst Price Targets...
